page.title: 05ENTERTAINMENT IN BROMPTON
page.content: There is not a lot of entertainment in Brompton and what there is,is mostly for adults.The Village Hall is the centre of most organised activities. Bingo is held every week as well as Whist and Domino Drives.For children there are Badminton classes and occasional discos.Brompton has 4 public houses which serve a variety of ales.They provide teams for quoits, darts and dominoes to play against other local teams.The most famous event in Brompton is the Whit Carnival.It consists of decorated floats,fancy dress,jazz bands and a fair.In 1985 there were 260 entries for the fancy dress and floats.The Carnival brings hundreds of people to the village from all over the area.
